phrases: Is that the kind of attitude you should have towards your girlfriend?
Do not you think your attitude is a little arrogant?
I have suffered a lot up till now.
We are going to be late!
That is because you took so long.
That is because you were being stupid.
The Dangerous Beauty Who Burns With Jealousy!!
Why did not you tell us?!
What did you say when you asked her out?
So the comedy duo is finally a couple.
Do not make such a big deal out of it.
What do you mean, a guy like me?
I knew this day would come eventually.
Sensei was looking for you two earlier.
Did you forget your summer homework?
Well, at this stage there is nothing more to say.
Just turn it in by Monday.
Let us work on it together.
Do you want to go to the library with Suzuki and the others?
If I am in a quiet place like the library,
It will be all eek, will not it?
Want to come to my place?
I brought today's milk for you.
She brings me milk every day, saying it will make me taller.
Today I have brought something really great.
If there is nothing else, hurry up and go home.
But I wanted to chat with your girlfriend.
We are going to study now, so you cannot.
It will just be for a bit.
A-chan, could you come here for a sec?
Mimi-chan, you are pretty tall and slim.
But A-chan always said he would never go out with a girl taller than him.
But he does not seem to mind my height...
Hey, did you know that A-chan's last girlfriend was really short?
That is why I gave up on A-chan.
But A-chan only likes short girls...
That is why I bring him milk every day, so that he will grow taller.
I decided that when A-chan grew taller than me, I would become his girlfriend.
What kind of dirty trick did you pull to get him, eh?
Do you want me to thread a needle through your nostrils and tie a knot?
A-chan cannot possibly have a girlfriend like you.
Do not say my name in that disgusting voice!
If you get any closer to A-chan,
I want the Mont Blanc cake!
Was that a hallucination just now?
Mimi, after you finish that, go home, okay?
I had no idea she was a model.
Saying anything to Otani would be pointless.
Well, there is no point in worrying.
Want to go have some fun, now that we have turned in our homework?
No matter what happens to me or what is said to me,
Your girlfriend and I are really getting along.
We are going to hang out together today, right?
In that case, you two go on ahead.
I do not want to walk home between two amazons.
You will look like a captured alien.
We need to have a little talk.
Why has it come to this?
She is totally staring me down.
How did someone like you come to be going out with A-chan?
I have been working really hard too!
I am really cute when I am with A-chan, are not I?
I have been acting like that ever since I met him.
Do you have any idea how tiring that is?
I give A-chan milk every single day,
I, on the other hand, was already over 170 cm when I was in elementary school.
I was already 168 cm when I was in the sixth grade.
Man, I have been put at the back because of my height since I was in kindergarten.
I was even taller than the tallest boy.
No matter what you do, you always draw attention.
If you talk, even just for a second, the teacher always sees
Why the hell am I reminiscing with an idiot like you?!
You were trying to catch me off guard?
When A-chan was going out with that short, cute girl, I completely gave up.
You would think you had no chance with your height.
I thought that deep down she would have been nasty.
She is not like you, Mimi-chan.
Deep down I am really a nasty
Shut that damn mouth of yours!
Who the hell are you calling nasty, you idiot?!
So after he broke up with that great girlfriend, he moved on to this?
In any case, I am not going to lose to you.
I am definitely going to win A-chan back.
That is all I have to say.
Could you lend me some money?
I only have 50 yen on me.
You have got some guts, walking into a family restaurant with only that much cash on you!
I forgot that I bought a magazine today.
You looked so cute and sweet that I totally forgot.
Well, I guess that cannot be helped.
It was a special situation today, so I will lend you some money.
I think I left my purse at work.
Just what is it that you like about her?
What is this, all of a sudden?!
Well, she is nothing like your last girlfriend.
I just cannot see what is so great about her.
This is not the time or the place to talk about this.
It is not like it is any of your business.
I like you much more than she does!
After all, I understand how Mimi-chan feels.
But I... I yelled at him and called him an idiot.
You do not need to worry about that.
He really is an idiot, after all.
How could he say that in response to a confession?
Anyone would be shocked by a sudden confession like that!
I am the one who was in the wrong.
Do not say bad things about A-chan!
I have never talked to him that way before.
I lost it and said something I should not have...
This is all your fault, you cow!
It is your fault that my life is falling apart!
What are you going to do about it, eh?
Why do not you try responding?
Are you lookin' for a fight, you dumb bitch?!
She must be really down, now that you have seen her true colors.
What do you mean by that?
Are you trying to tell me that the Mimi I know...
Of course she wants to act cute in front of the guy she likes.
This happens because you say pointless things...
She said the three of us should do something after school today.
Now that her cover's blown, Mimi-chan's going to get serious, right?
What do you mean by serious?
What would happen to an idiot like Otani if a pretty girl like her got serious about him?
I am not going to lose!
I am not going to let all of my efforts go to waste!
We will go wherever you want, A-chan.
Please, just go away, both of you.
There is something I need to say to you properly.
I do not want to hear it.
You are going to reject me, right?
I do not want to hear it!
I thought you liked Otani more than me!
Like you would know how it feels to be rejected!
I thought about giving up, too,
I might be his girlfriend now,
I can hardly tell whether he actually likes me or not.
But I love him more than I can say, so it is fine.
I am not going to give Otani up to someone who just runs away when she gets rejected.
She said she cannot deal with an idiot like you, so she is giving up on me.
It must have hurt her a lot the first time you rejected her.
But she worked hard to win you over.
She really is amazing, that girl.
What was that you were saying back there?
Something about not being able to tell whether I actually like you or not, was not it?
You deliberately stood on higher steps.
Well, I would not have been as cool if we were standing on level ground.
I was just looking over what the students aim to do in the future.
It is almost time for them to make their final decisions, is not it?
It looks like All Hanshin-Kyojin will finally have to break up.
What are we going to do while you are away, Otani?
The Different Paths Risa and Otani Will Walk.
The Different Paths Risa and Otani Will Walk
